com.github.cwilper.fcrepo.store.legacy
Class LegacyFedoraStore

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
FedoraStore
public class LegacyFedoraStore
extends Object
implements FedoraStore

Legacy FedoraStore implementation compatible with pre-Akubra versions of Fedora.

Constructor Detail

LegacyFedoraStore

public LegacyFedoraStore(FileStore objectStore,
                         FileStore contentStore,
                         DTOReader readerFactory,
                         DTOWriter writerFactory)
Creates an instance. Upon construction, the object and content path registries will be built for the first time if they're empty.

Parameters:
objectStore - the file store to use for Fedora objects.
contentStore - the file store to use for managed content.
readerFactory - the factory to use for deserializing.
writerFactory - the factory to use for serializing.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if any argument is null.

getSession in interface FedoraStore
Returns:
the session, never null.
